English: You can represent an angle with either one,
they're just two different ways of measuring it.
But we want to be able to go back and forth between them.
You might start off with degrees and want radians or vice versa.
So it's important to know how to convert.
Chinese: 你可以用其中一种方式表示一个角，
它们只是测量它的两种不同方法。
但我们希望能够在它们之间来回切换。
你可能从度数开始，却需要弧度，或反之亦然。
因此，掌握转换方法很重要。

English: You can represent an angle with either one, they're just two different ways of measuring it.
But we want to be able to go back and forth between them.
You might start off with degrees and want radians or vice versa.
So it's important to know how to convert.
Chinese: 你可以用其中一种方式表示一个角，它们只是测量它的两种不同方法。
但我们希望能够在它们之间来回切换。
你可能从度数开始，却需要弧度，或反之亦然。
因此，掌握转换方法很重要。

input: You can represent an angle with either one, they're just two different ways of measuring it. Two different scales. But we want to be able to go back and forth between them. You might start off with degrees and want radians or vice versa. So it's important to know how to convert.
